7  void EnvironmentMapping::onInit()
8  {
9  NODELET_DEBUG("Initializing nodelet...");
10 
11  nh = getNodeHandle();
12  pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("distance_to_obj",1000);
13  // output from optical capturing
14  std_msgs::Float64Ptr output(new std_msgs::Float64());
15  output->data = 0.33;
16  while (true)
17  {
18  sleep(1);
19  pub.publish(output);
20  }
21  NODELET_DEBUG("the distance is %f", output->data);
22  }
23 }
